publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5019 Mark Ballard: Wear It Pink—That the Parliament recognises that nearly 4,000 women in Scotland will be diagnosed with breast cancer in 2006; endorses Breast Cancer Campaign’s organisation of "wear it pink" on Friday 27 October 2006; notes the importance of the event in promoting awareness of breast cancer among the general public; encourages MSPs to participate in the initiative to help raise funds for independent breast cancer research at centres of excellence throughout the United Kingdom, and congratulates Breast Cancer Campaign and all of its supporters for having raised nearly £1.7 million in 2005 through "wear it pink". Supported by: Patrick Harvie*, Bill Butler*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Bruce Crawford*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Alex Neil*, Carolyn Leckie*, Tommy Sheridan*

S2M-5019 Mark Ballard: Wear It Pink—That the Parliament recognises that nearly 4,000 women in Scotland will be diagnosed with breast cancer in 2006; endorses Breast Cancer Campaign’s organisation of "wear it pink" on Friday 27 October 2006; notes the importance of the event in promoting awareness of breast cancer among the general public; encourages MSPs to participate in the initiative to help raise funds for independent breast cancer research at centres of excellence throughout the United Kingdom, and congratulates Breast Cancer Campaign and all of its supporters for having raised nearly £1.7 million in 2005 through "wear it pink". Supported by: Patrick Harvie, Bill Butler, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Bruce Crawford, Mrs Nanette Milne, Alex Neil, Carolyn Leckie, Tommy Sheridan, Shiona Baird*, Fiona Hyslop*, Dr Jean Turner*, Robin Harper*, Chris Ballance*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Campbell Martin*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Margaret Smith*, Eleanor Scott*, Frances Curran*, Scott Barrie*, Shona Robison*, Michael McMahon*, Margaret Mitchell*, Sarah Boyack*
S2M-5019 Wear It Pink (lodged on 26 October 2006) Susan Deacon*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-5019 Wear It Pink (lodged on 26 October 2006) Dennis Canavan*, Trish Godman*
S2M-5019 Wear It Pink (lodged on 26 October 2006) Jackie Baillie*
S2M-5019 Wear It Pink (lodged on 26 October 2006) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-5019 Wear It Pink (lodged on 26 October 2006) Rosie Kane*
